CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Custom_Pricing1__c, 'Yes'), ISPICKVAL(Are_We_Waiving_Network_Fees__c, 'Yes'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Activation Incentives'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Blockchain Partnerships'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Institutional Trading Partnership'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Loans'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Channel Sales'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Indirect Liquidity Partners'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Performance Incentives'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Product Integrations'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Referrals') )
CustomField.label: Needs Pricing Approval
